dishes.name: Garlic Bread Loaf
dishes.desc: Open-faced load of ciabatta bread with garlic butter schmear. Try it with melted mozzarella or add Pizza sauce!

dishes.name: Marinara & Meatballs
dishes.desc: (4) house-made, hand rolled Tagliani Meatballs with your choice of sauce.

dishes.name: Burrata Mozzarella
dishes.desc: Filled with shredded mozzarella and stracciatella cream. Comes with pesto, diced Roma tomatoes, salt & pepper, olive oil, balsamic dressing, and basil.

dishes.name: Today's Soup
dishes.desc: New way, Every day! Ask your server about today's soup.

dishes.name: Minestrome
dishes.desc: Comforting and hearty Italian vegetable soup with beans, onions, celery, carrots, chicken stock, and tomatoes. Served in Cup or Bowl.

dishes.name: Clam Chowder
dishes.desc: Comforting and hearty soup made with clams, potatoes, and onions. Served in Cup or Bowl.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.desc: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and balsamic reduction sauce. REG & LRG sizes includes a choice of soup.

dishes.name: Antipasto Salad
dishes.desc: Mixed greens, pepperoni, prosciutto, macaroni, mozzarella, melon, artichokes, and olives with Italian dressing. REG & LRG sizes includes a choice of soup.

dishes.name: Iceberg Wedge Salad
dishes.desc: Quarter-sliced head of Iceberg Lettuce topped with tomatoes, scallions, bacon, and Gorgonzola cheese crumbles served with Bleu cheese dressing.

dishes.name: Seafood Roll
dishes.desc: Choose either Rock Shrimp or Lobster served hot or cold in lemon aioli, lettuce, and tomato on a toasted garlic hoagie roll. Comes with a soup, salad, fries, tots, or fruits. REG & LRG sizes includes a choice of soup.

dishes.name: Chicken Parmesan Sandwich
dishes.desc: Mama's Chicken Parmesan sandwich perched up high on top of a cozy nest of marinara and melted mozzarella, on a fresh baked bun or choice of bread with basil and Parmesan.

dishes.name: Buffalo Chicken Wrap
dishes.desc: Something fresh with a crunch and a little kick to the head? Feast your eyes on the Buffalo Chicken Wrap! Chicken fritti strips, romaine lettuce, diced tomatoes, Tagliani house-made Buttermilk Ranch, Tagliani Buffalo Wing Sauce, sprinkled with parmesan and wrapped in a Spinach tortilla.

dishes.name: Calamari Fritti
dishes.desc: Calamari strips breaded with crispy panko, served with Spicy cocktail & marinara or Mediterranean style (Lemon-caper butter, Kalamata Olives, and Feta Cheese).

dishes.name: Lobster Mac & Cheese
dishes.desc: 5 oz. Lobster meat swimming in our Cheddar-fredo, macaroni pasta, and topped with melted Cheddar cheese. Includes a soup or salad option.

dishes.name: Shrimp Scampi
dishes.desc: Shrimp sautéed in garlic, lemon-caper butter, basil & white wine over fettuccine.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.desc: Choose sliced tomatoes or pizza sauce, olive oil, fresh mozzarella, parmesan, fresh julienned basil leaves.

dishes.name: Garlic Chicken Pizza
dishes.desc: Pesto Alla Genovese, Mozzarella, sliced Grilled Chicken, Garlic, Sautéed Red Onion, Mushrooms, Basil, Oregano, Thyme, and shaved Parmigiano-Reggiano Parmesan Cheese.

dishes.name: Cicero's Calzone
dishes.desc: Oven-baked Italian turnover with sausage, pepperoni, caramelized onion, black olives, mushrooms, mozzarella, and ricotta.

dishes.name: Chocolate Chip Canoli
dishes.desc: Crispy Canoli shell with fresh sweet ricotta, almonds, and chocolate chips.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.desc: Ladyfinger cookies dipped in coffee liqueur and espresso, layered in a sweet cream Mascarpone cheese, and coated with dark cocoa.
